info.description:
A college-age boy, staying with his scientist mother over the summer, finds himself in the middle of a sudden epidemic. A strange virus is being spread through physical contact, turning people of every gender into curvaceous, perpetually horny anthropomorphic animal women, along with the occasional hermaphrodite.

Thankfully for him, he is one of the rare exceptions, someone who carries the virus yet is not effected by it. Of course, he'll still have a rough time fitting in in a world that suddenly wants to fuck him dry.
